医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
C-Path 通过新拨款支持创新的 ALS、神经退行性疾病研究关键路径研究所 (C-Path) 转化治疗加速器 (TRxA) 今天宣布与 Jon 合作，向宾夕法尼亚州立大学医学院细胞和分子生理学教授 Daniela C. Zarnescu 博士提供一项新的研究资助Njardarson 博士，亚利桑那大学教授。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240808/C-Path-supports-innovative-ALS-neurodogenic-disease-research-with-new-grant.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240808/C-Path-supports-innovative-ALS-neurodogenic-disease-research-with-new-grant.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6592a74b-1c11-4a1a-b127-9e08b6f7824b Thu, 08 Aug 2024 15:58:16 -0400 C-Path supports innovative ALS, neurodegenerative disease research with new grant
突破性发现可以通过改善细胞动员来促进干细胞移植阿尔伯特·爱因斯坦医学院三人研究小组的一项发现可能会提高干细胞移植的有效性，干细胞移植通常用于患有癌症、血液疾病或由有缺陷的干细胞引起的自身免疫性疾病的患者，这些干细胞会产生人体所有不同的血液细胞。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240808/Breakthrough-discovery-could-boost-stem-cell-transplants-by-improving-cell-mobilization.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240808/Breakthrough-discovery-could-boost-stem-cell-transplants-by-improving-cell-mobilization.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cedebf5b-5145-433b-afdc-a2eff5ac2033 Thu, 08 Aug 2024 15:54:37 -0400 Breakthrough discovery could boost stem-cell transplants by improving cell mobilization
产前饥荒暴露与 2 型糖尿病风险增加有关哥伦比亚大学梅尔曼公共卫生学院、北卡罗来纳大学教堂山分校和乌克兰国家科学院的研究人员以 1932 年至 1933 年人为制造的乌克兰大饥荒为背景，研究了产前饥荒与成人 2 型糖尿病 (T2DM)。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240808/Prenatal-famine-exposure-tied-to-higher-risk-of-Type-2-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240808/Prenatal-famine-exposure-tied-to-higher-risk-of-Type-2-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cb561690-348d-47af-aa88-c38560a41829 Thu, 08 Aug 2024 15:40:31 -0400 Prenatal famine exposure tied to higher risk of Type 2 diabetes
大麻依赖与头颈癌发病率增加有关南加州大学凯克医学中心和南加州大学卡鲁索耳鼻喉科 - 头颈外科的一部分的南加州大学头颈中心的一项研究表明，大麻是全世界最常用的非法物质，与头颈病发生率增加有关。颈部癌症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240808/Cannabis-dependence-linked-with-increased-occurrence-of-head-and-neck-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240808/Cannabis-dependence-linked-with-increased-occurrence-of-head-and-neck-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=158e5b1e-7e50-4ca2-86ea-8982a3a1b504 Thu, 08 Aug 2024 14:10:05 -0400 Cannabis dependence associated with increased occurrence of head and neck cancer
基因活性可以预测黑色素瘤治疗的严重副作用一项新的研究显示，某些负责构建脾酪氨酸激酶蛋白质的基因的活动模式可以预测哪些黑色素瘤患者可能会因旨在治疗最致命的皮肤癌的免疫疗法而产生严重副作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240808/Gene-activity-can-predict-severe-side-effects-from-melanoma-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240808/Gene-activity-can-predict-severe-side-effects-from-melanoma-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0e3d9ad9-3987-416c-8d59-8a890522198f Thu, 08 Aug 2024 14:05:57 -0400 Gene activity can predict severe side effects from melanoma treatment
研究显示，许多反复喘息的儿童患有“无声的”肺部感染弗吉尼亚大学医学院的新研究显示，近四分之一反复喘息的儿童患有“无声”肺部感染，抗病毒药物治疗比常用类固醇治疗效果更好，类固醇可能带来终生副作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240808/Many-children-with-recurrent-wheezing-have-silent-lung-infections-research-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240808/Many-children-with-recurrent-wheezing-have-silent-lung-infections-research-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=55ecd17f-a8d0-4c74-8bf9-78e096cdae54 Thu, 08 Aug 2024 13:34:42 -0400 Many children with recurrent wheezing have "silent" lung infections, research reveals
创新计划促进积极的青少年恋爱关系和有效避孕药具的使用浪漫关系在青少年发展中发挥着重要作用。大多数年轻人在青春期中期（14 至 17 岁）都至少有过一段恋爱关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240808/Innovative-program-promotes-positive-adolescent-romantic-relationships-and-use-of- effective-contraceptives.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240808/Innovative-program-promotes-positive-adolescent-romantic-relationships-and-use-of- effective-contraceptives.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a8b379e7-b0e9-437c-8a7b-ea058d9186d7 Thu, 08 Aug 2024 13:22:06 -0400 Innovative program promotes positive adolescent romantic relationships and use of effective contraceptives
ProDOL 彻底改变了活细胞中的蛋白质定量科学家们开发出了一种计算活细胞中标记蛋白质的新方法，该方法可能成为生物医学研究领域的标准且有价值的工具。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240808/ProDOL-revolutionizes- Protein-quantification-in-living-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240808/ProDOL-revolutionizes- Protein-quantification-in-living-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=17afc385-7716-4e16-b4e4-2eb97a3fea72 Thu, 08 Aug 2024 13:15:25 -0400 ProDOL revolutionizes protein quantification in living cells
关于癌症相关成纤维细胞在促进淋巴转移中的作用的新见解淋巴结转移是癌症进展的关键因素，显着影响患者的预后和治疗结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240808/New-insights-into-the-role-of-cancer-linked-fascinating-in-promoting-lymphatic-metastasis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240808/New-insights-into-the-role-of-cancer- Associated-filingblasts-in-promoting-lymphatic-metastasis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d2298f0e-a712-4681-af7c-10cf5d9ac2d6 Thu, 08 Aug 2024 12:51:31 -0400 New insights into the role of cancer-associated fibroblasts in promoting lymphatic metastasis
个体化新抗原癌症治疗在早期试验中证明了安全性和有效性几十年来，研究人员一直致力于开发能够启动免疫系统识别和攻击肿瘤细胞表面蛋白质的疗法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240808/Individualized-neoantigen-cancer-therapy-demonstrates-safety-and-efficacy-in-early-trials.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240808/Individualized-neoantigen-cancer-therapy-demonstrates-safety-and-efficacy-in-early-trials.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=40a57cbe-398c-461d-acd7-b86c7840b6a1 Thu, 08 Aug 2024 12:46:07 -0400 Individualized neoantigen cancer therapy demonstrates safety and efficacy in early trials
